name: ORBIT
description: Maneuver your ship between planets at breakneck speeds and take gravity into account as you crush your competitors in this awesome twin-stick spacebrawler!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600 GT, ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: doesnt work with any of my controlers. both USB. i configured both of them in big picture and had an xbox controller app to emulate. still nothin.  game might be ok but i cant use it. why isnt USB a standard controller type?  So i wasnt able to play at all. I looked for some help on this but i have seen nothing online about it. there is very little info about this game. normally ill spend a hell of a lot of time getting a game to work but here... i just want to play something fun to play with my kids on local. this isnt it for me.  So with the above in mind i rate this not recommened.
